评论详情: The fit is wonderful, the material is great! Size guide is accurate, though watch that bust measurement. It's not that stuff you read the description and think you're getting something decent just for the flimsy crap to show up, oh no, not here! Beautiful color and cut with quality material. Just fabulous.
Very beautiful dress, It runs a little small though So order the next size bigger is My advice

评论概述: Beautiful but runs about 2 sizes small
评论详情: Very beautiful fabric and very well made but runs about 2 sizes small.
Impressed with the quality.
Amazing quality dress for what I paid. Very comfy and it has pockets!! I’m 5’3”, 124lbs and I got small. Tad bit roomy but I safety pinned a little at the waist.

There are details that I like. The shoulder ribbons are sewn in, I love the design of the textile, and the finishing is pretty good.  The lacing in the bodice is not adjustable so buy the right size for you.  The fabric is light weight and needs a much more structure to lay correctly (wearing a support garment underneath can help, I'm going to take it apart and redo the top all together.) You also may need a petting coat, or to apply horse hair braid to get the shown skirt shape.
Wearing it as my steampunk outfit… love it.
Very pretty pattern and nice weight to the fabric.  Kiddo has a very large bust and this fit fine without being obviously stretched.  Kiddo wore it over a black mesh top and black tights and boots.
Very cute dress but runs small

The fabric and embroidery was gorgeous. The fabric is a good thickness and a little stretchy. Not too hot! You might want to reinforce the ribbon on the straps. Mine was coming loose so I had to re-sew it. It fit quite comfy. I would say with sizing go up one size. If I would've gone smaller it wouldn't have fit.

There's more than one way to wear this dress, and they all look great.  Scarlet Darkness always delivers high quality, and this is yet another item that looks great as part of a costume or just for daily wear.
It's a beautiful dress. With pockets. What more can you ask for.

Got this dress in the green. This will work great for the Halloween costume i was looking to use it for! Nicely put together. Fit was right on and flattering. . Will use it for other occasions as well.  Great buy!

I purchased this for my daughter to wear this summer to a few events. The dress looked great. She loved that it could be worn with various shirts and tees to change up how it looked. It can be worn as is but adding a shirt was useful for occasions where she was not allowed to wear strapping dresses.

I got mine a size too big, but it’s nothing adding a corset won’t fix. There’s a bit of extra fabric on the back of my neck that I’ll have to get tailored, but it’s the best quality dress I’ve ever bought at this price. If you’re between sizes, I recommend sizing down, especially if you’re going to be adding a corset. The fit is extremely flattering for thicker girls.

This dress is fantastic! The color  Black Jacquard is deep black with an almost shimmering/shiny fabric and stitching to make the black design. The fabric is lined with soft-to-the-touch fabric that is very comfortable on the skin. The shape of the dress is very flattering, and it has pockets (a huge bonus). I've tried wearing this a couple of different ways, such as with an underdress and floral print corset.  This will be part of my Halloween costume this year; I can't wait.

评论概述: 6 stars -- off the chart as a costume
评论详情: Very pretty, made with the quality of (perhaps fast-fashion) clothes, and not at all the one-night costume you might expect. These are actual, real, wearable clothes, well made and GORGEOUS in person. I can even wear it as a party dress, especially if I drape a shawl over the top. Perfect size; I am 5'1" and 125lbs, ordered size 6. I can't overstate the quality for what would be considered a costume piece.

This dress is cute, and it is good quality for the price. The pockets drive me insane though. I returned the first one because I thought it was defective, but the replacement had the same exact issue. The pocket on the left side is sewn into the lining of the dress. It limits the pocket size, dress movement, and the excess fabric makes it difficult to zip. The other pocket is normal.

评论概述: Love it! Sizing in review below.
评论详情: I recommend. The fabric is gorgeous. It shimmers between black and red. My emo/goth daughter LOVES this dress. The sizing is a bit iffy, she has a waist 30 inches and hips 35 inches, chest is 32, cup size A. 5 foot 6 at 125 pounds. The medium fit well. It was slightly loose in the chest, but not bad at all. We were debating between a small or medium. Still conservative looking on her, despite the little extra room in the chest. Once off, we had to tip the top half of the dress to get the zipper up. When on, the zipper went up fine. If you are her size, you may want to go small if you have the smaller chest. Again, not too loose in her in the medium.
Due to the reviews I sized up and wished I hadn’t! It was too large and loose in the bodice. I wished I could have tightened it to be a true corset. Unfortunately I had to return.
Beautiful fabric, great quality and so comfortable. Runs pretty true to size.
Soft silky fabric, lovely full skirt!

After reading some of the reviews I was a little hesitant about the sizing, but I went  ahead and ordered my regular dress size. It fit like a glove! Personally I have a rather small bust, so there’s definitely some extra space in the top portion. The material is very nice, it’s very comfortable and breathable. I paired it with a dress from the same brand.

It’s well-made, prettier than in the pictures, has side zipper and pockets! But I need more of a corseted top. Lovely dress but 38-DD at size 16, I still need a little more, I did not want to force the zipper so I am returning.

评论概述: Pretty dressed for the price. Looks great, but not the highest quality.
评论详情: I'm torn on giving this 3 stars vs 4 stars, but going with 4 seems fine: this is a $46 dress that looks, fits, and wears like a $46 dress. The value is fine-- it isn't a great deal, but it isn't overpriced. We all love deals, so this would be GREAT if it was a $25 price-point, but it isn't a problem at this range.  The construction quality feels a bit flimsy, and so I classify this as "costume" or "event" quality-- not something you should expect to wear regularly or for years and years. This is fast fashion. It has the look but not the longevity. That isn't necessarily a knock, but it isn't great, either.  Happy with the order, and it looks great. Seems to fit true to size, and pairs well with accessories like a waist-cincher, etc.

评论概述: Very nice, it run small in the bust
评论详情: I bought to wear as a steampunk dress for a comic-con. Great fabric for the price (it's lined too), pretty--although the color was lighter/brighter than the picture.  I used the size, but his dress is not for anyone with a good size bosom. Even undoing the lacing in back didn't help.  I was heartbroken. Had to return.

This dress is very pretty, and the color/fabric are just as described. The fit is a little smaller than expected, and doesn't exactly match the chart. The waist was advertised as stretchy, but I didn't find it very stretchy at all. The shoulder straps are separate, and tied together with one ribbon, which occasionally comes untied. Overall, I do like the dress, just isn't exactly what I was hoping.
Size smaller than expected. Buy 2 sizes bigger than normal.

评论概述: Such an Exquisite, High-Quality, Luxurious Gothic Gown
评论详情: This is a lovely and beautifully made Gothic dress that has layers of sophistication and class. I love the fit, the look really is breathtaking, and such Gothic goodness. The corset lacing is something that is tough to beat, the skirt is flowy and layered, and it fits well, and perfect for almost all occasions. I really love it; I just wish I had more gatherings to wear it to. It is so lovely!

I typically wear a 0 or 2 in dresses (5'7", bust 32, waist 26.5, hips 33) and ordered the 6 in this as it was the smallest size available. Unfortunately, it's not quite small enough for me, which is a little bit of a bummer. I might try to take it up in the back as I like pieces like this to be really fitted. It also has a bit of elastic in the back of the waistband, so this could be a lot friendlier to larger sizes!  Overall, the dress is well made. The fabric is the quality I would expect from this price point and the construction seems solid. There's an invisible zipper on the side, which is nice. The shoulders are also adjustable by tie, though I've had some issues with them staying tied because the ribbon is satin.  Overall, I like the dress, but I'd like it more if it came a little smaller.
This dress is very well made and feels like nice and solid. the fabric has some heft to it and doesn't feel cheap. Very happy with this dress.

评论概述: Another Comfortable & Quality Scarlet Darkness Garment with Real, Functional Pockets!
评论详情: This is a great dress. My eldest saw this on me and said, "Mom! You look beautiful!" For reference, I am 5'4" pear-shaped woman weighing 170 pounds. I got a size 12. I am actively working on shedding weight--especially in my thighs and bottom. After doing so, this dress will look nicer on me. It does fit me now, but will fit better later.  The material is quality and there is a liner for the whole dress. The liner isn't solidly attached, so it can bunch when putting on the dress. The side zipper is a bit stiff, even off me. I think with time, it will loosen. You will still need a bra of some sort. I am smaller chested and had no trouble with this dress. Those that are more well-endowed might find it a bit snug.  This dress could also be worn with some kind of peasant top under, if you like. I probably will.

I chose this dress in the red and it is absolutely adorable. It is very Gothic looking and also vintage. I like that you can Tighten and loosen the fit with the laces so there is a little bit of wiggle room. The fabric is a good quality and I think it is a little bit larger so you may want to consider sizing down but again you can kind of customize the fit with this one
Talla demasiado reducida
